title: How to Find the Bottles in Ocarina of Time

steps.title: Go to Kakariko Village.
steps.content: Go to Kakariko Village. You can get the first empty bottle as a child by helping a woman in front of the Kakariko Graveyard collect her chickens. Return the seven chickens in their pen and the woman will reward you the bottle.

steps.title: Go to Lon-Lon Ranch.
steps.content: Go to Lon-Lon Ranch. Again as a child, play the Talon’s Cucco Game at Lon-Lon Ranch. All you need to do is to find the 3 chickens different from the rest. You’ll win a bottle with Lon-Lon milk once successful.

steps.title: Go to Lake Hylia.
steps.content: Go to Lake Hylia. The last bottle that can be obtained as a child is unmissable and can be found in Lake Hylia. You must retrieve a bottle sunk underwater by Princess Ruto. This bottle has a letter in it and once you deliver the letter back to King Zora in Zora’s Domain, he will let you keep the bottle.

steps.title: Go to Hyrule Field.
steps.content: Go to Hyrule Field. As an adult Link this time, find and defeat the 10 Big Poes across Hyrule Field. Defeat them while riding your horse using your bow. Bring your defeated poes to the one-eyed ghost in Hyrule Castle. He will be inside the first door on the right coming from the Hyrule Field.
